name: PropulsiveProblematics
description:
A two player game where you put your math skills to the test! Race to the finish by correctly answering the most problems the fastest!

The game currently features randomized Addition, Subtraction, and Multiplication problems, or a mix of all 3! There are also 3 challenging difficulty levels suitable for all ages.

Controls:

  • This game has support for generic gamepad controllers (such as an X-Box or Playstation controller or offbrands designed for PC use).

If no controllers are available, use these keyboard buttons:

  • Player 1 (left side) : W, A, S, D keys for selection, Left Ctrl key or Spacebar for menu confirmation
  • Player 2 (right side): Arrow keys for selection, Right Ctrl key or Enter for menu confirmation
  • Pressing the Delete key any time while in the main menu will reset the scoreboard.
